overview: Witness the Legendary Battle of #1 Lightweight and Welterweight Mixed Martial Artist in the World BJ "The Prodigy" Penn as he moves up in weight to take on Undefeated Member of the Gracie Clan - Rodrigo "The Highlander" Gracie.  Also on the card WWE Super Star Sean O' Hare vs. Pride Veteran Shungo Oyama. UFC Veteran Wesley "Cabbage" Corriera vs. Undefeated Japan Wrestler Yoshiro Nakao.  Fight Card:  Gilbert Melendez vs Kaynan "The Barbarian" Kaku  Dennis "Superman" Hallman vs Ross "Da Boss" Ebanez  Antoni Hardonk vs Wes "The Project" Sims  Kristof "The Hurricane" Midoux vs Mike Malone  Spencer "Aitor" Canup vs Juda A'alona  Sean O'Haire vs Shungo Oyama  Yoshihiro Nakao vs Wesley "Cabbage" Correira  Royler Gracie vs Kazuyuki Miyata  Carter "The Beast" Williams vs Tom "Green Beret" Howard  B.J. "The Prodigy" Penn vs Rodrigo "The Highlander" Gracie
title: Rumble on the Rock 6
